defaultValue:
请手动输入最新值，而不要使用 Ctrl+C / Ctrl+V， 否则会加载 saves/common/LunaSettings/ioGate.json.data 中的缓存。
Please enter the latest values manually instead of using Ctrl+C / Ctrl+V, otherwise the cache in saves/common/LunaSettings/ioGate.json.data will be loaded.

fieldDescription:
用户的唯一身份标识
Unique identification of the user

fieldName:
你的飞船装配方案ID
VariantId
fieldDescription:
选择你的variantId
variantId在.variant文件中，.variant文件所在目录：游戏根目录/starsector-core/data/variants
只支持原版variantId，不支持自定义，不支持其他Mod的飞船
若variantId为空字符串 / null / 不存在，默认为nebula_Standard
Select your variantId
The variantId is in the .variant file, the .variant file is in the directory: game root/starsector-core/data/variants
Only the original variantId is supported, no customization, no other Mods for ships
If variantId is empty / null / does not exist, it defaults to nebula_Standard.

fieldName:
飞船配装方案ID的补充
Supplement To VariantId
fieldDescription:
LunaLib的String输入框存在字符数量限制，有些variantId无法被完整地输入和读取
当上方输入框的字符数已满时，请将variantId分割为两部分，并将它的后半部分填入此输入框
LunaLib's String input box has a character limit, some variantId can't be entered and read completely
When the upper input box is full, please split the variantId into two parts and put the second half of the variantId into this input box

fieldName:
ioHub服务器地址
ioHub Server Address
fieldDescription:
客户端连接对外服的IPv4地址
IPv4 address of the client connection to the external server

fieldName:
ioHub对外服端口
ioHub external port
fieldDescription:
客户端连接对外服的端口
The port of the client connection to the external server

defaultValue:
当点击保存设置时，将会执行所有值为true的触发器。
When clicking Save Settings, all triggers with a value of true will be executed.

fieldName:
启动网络客户端
Launch Network Client
fieldDescription:
客户端与服务器建立连接
成功连接服务器后，无法使用该触发器来关闭连接，除非关闭游戏进程
The client establishes a connection with the server
After successfully connecting to the server, this trigger cannot be used to close the connection unless the game process is closed

使用userId登录服务器
成功登录后，无法使用该触发器来注销，除非关闭游戏进程
Logs in to the server using userId
After successfully logging in, it is not possible to log out using this trigger, unless the game process is closed

上传MatchInfo，等待其他用户匹配
Upload MatchInfo and wait for other users to match it
